document.title: PanderMaatSanders
document.intro: The PanderMaatSanders subcorpus was compiled for a study of the causal connectives 'daardoor', 'daarom' and 'dus' in Dutch news. It consists of 100 cases from a Dutch newspaper (de Volkskrant 1994 and 1995). The DiscAn corpus is a collection of subcorpora of Dutch language that have bee... The PanderMaatSanders subcorpus was compiled for a study of the causal connectives 'daardoor', 'daarom' and 'dus' in Dutch news. It consists of 100 cases from a Dutch newspaper (de Volkskrant 1994 and 1995).
